children.text: The exhibition is the result of the project "Revitalizing Iskonawa Vocabulary: Bridging Language Archives to a Digital Exhibition," supported by the 2024 LLILAS Benson Digital Scholarship–AVAnnotate Project Fellowship.
The videos were documented with funding from the Language Legacies Grant by the Endangered Language Fund, as part of the project
“Documentation of Narratives about Iskonawa Material Culture.”
This grant supported the creation of a community-based team of Iskonawa artisans in Pucallpa and the Callería Native Community, who collaboratively recorded these videos in 2023.
